title: How do I remove the List all Tabs button for Firefox 108 and above? (2024)
content:
The answer from here doesn't work anymore: https://support.mozilla.org/questions/1394194

So is there any updated answer for the current version of Firefox? Else I will have to downgrade and disable updates for the future. This new version is making it impossible to drag the browser around when it's below a certain width, because it covers the tabs area 100% now. I really need the feature to drag my browser around without maximizing it every time.
creator: kuanwu01

title: Pull-down tabs on websites not working properly on many webpages
content:
Pull-down tabs on websites not working properly on many webpages -- I'm on v131.0 (ARM [M1-MAX]) .

Clicking upon headings, SHOULD present an APPEARING pull-down menu, but the pull-down-menu is fleeting !

title: Problém se sponzorovanými odkazy
content:
Dobrý den, patrně od jedné z posledních aktualizací nelze otevřít odkazy z mailu nebo sponzorované odkazy ve vyhledávání google (zobrazí se hlaška "Server nenalezen". Problém se vyskytuje pouze na PC, na Androidu je vše ok. Příklad: https://www.lhinsights.com/re?tm=526191ad507b4b85a7f4304a43ff42d2&t=element-youtube-image&i=f09ec5f3-274c-4d0c-9d7f-6df85a12ac28&tid=PWWL0yr0Rbec5pw&u=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2Fv4V8f8_UNPo%3Futm_campaign%3D20240915NE%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_source%3Dleadhub

nebo kterýkoli ze sponzorovaných výsledků vyhledáváí, např.: https://www.google.cz/search?q=auto&lr=&sca_esv=fe6507be86e52302&hl=cs&as_qdr=all&ei=upEDZ7SYGJ-3i-gP1q2TcA&ved=0ahUKEwi03Ymz4_uIAxWf2wIHHdbWBA4Q4dUDCA8&uact=5&oq=auto&gs_-&sclient=gws-wiz-serp

Děkuji, Petr
creator: petrfi

title: Mozilla Roadmap question
content:
Dear Mozilla expert,

Firefox consumes a lot of memory resources for inactive tables. in other browsers there's a feature to disable processing of inactive tables does Mozilla have such feature in their roadmap? if so, then when it can be expected?

KR Sergii
creator: engin5

title: Bookmark toolbar stopped working in the latest version
content:
After an update of both macOS (to macOS Sequoia 15.0.1) and Firefox Developer Edition (to 132.0b3 (aarch64)) the Bookmark Toolbar stopped working. The same issue appeared on my Windows PC.

Bookmarks toolbar is visible, I can show and hide it but it does not display any of my saved bookmarks. Luckily, they were not deleted and I still can access them via Bookmarks Menu, which is less than optimal.

The Drag&Drop functionality does not work either. When I grab the opened Tab, drag it on the Toolbar and release it, the Tab gets opened in the new browser window and it's not saved.
creator: mat.hudak

title: Unable to login to face book and the tab for Foxnews crashes after a couple hours
content:
With the last couple of updates to Firefox, I can't successfully log in to FB. I get the error msg "Your Request Couldn't be Processed" three times and then I can access FB, but I am then unable to post any images and am forced to leave FB since it is frozen. The other problem I am having is the open tab with Fox news gives me a crash report if I leave it open without viewing it. Whe I try to use Edge, Chrome, or Brave there is no problems for the same sites.

I have made sure I have the latest version of FF, cleared cache and closed all extensions.
creator: graypanthercommander

title: Increasingly, Firefox will not process routine actions, for example like signing in to a website with a password, and I have to use a different browser (Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge) to accomplish the task.
content: Increasingly, Firefox will not process routine actions, for example like signing in to a website with a password, and I have to use a different browser (Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge) to accomplish the task. There are other routine actions causing problems as well, but the bottom line is Firefox is losing its functionality and it is forcing me to use other browsers. I am sure you don't want to lose users in the browser wars, so maybe you will take this particular concern seriously, and actually respond to me so I know you are actually out there and taking complaints about Firefox browser performance with the appropriate concern and action regarding this issue.
creator: alanbala
